description: This table contains common information from General Use Notes items. This table focuses on time-insensitive, once-per-record data while other HNO tables (e.g., NOTES_ACCT, CODING_CLA_NOTES) contain the data for different note types.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record.

columns.name: NOTE_TYPE_NOADD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This virtual item is populated with a category value from Note - Type No-Add (I HNO 51) according to the following logic: * if Note - Type No-Add (I HNO 51) is populated, use the value directly * if Note - Type No-Add (I HNO 51) is null and the note is not ambulatory, return null * if Note - Type No-Add (I HNO 51) is null and the note has an ambulatory encounter context, obtain a category from the UCN note type (I HNO 34033) and map that value to an equivalent category from Note - Type No Add (I HNO 51), if possible


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the patient encounter to which the note is attached. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: ENTRY_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created this note. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: NOTE_DESC
columns.description: This is a free text description of the note.

columns.name: CREATE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The note's create instant.

columns.name: UNSIGNED_YN
columns.description:
A flag for if the note record is considered an unsigned note.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DELETE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the note is deleted.

columns.name: DELETE_USER_ID
columns.description: User who deleted the note

columns.name: COSIGNED_NOTE_LINK
columns.description: Contains a contact serial number (CSN) that points to the resident's note being cosigned. Cosigning Note Link (I HNO 34158) is a link for the opposite direction.

columns.name: DATE_OF_SERVIC_DTTM
columns.description: The note's date of service.

columns.name: SIGNED_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This item points to the ID of the signed note that this note is addending/editing/cosigning.

columns.name: LST_FILED_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the note was last edited.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The date and time when this row was created or last updated in Clarity.

columns.name: CURRENT_AUTHOR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the current author of the note for indexing purposes.

columns.name: LETTER_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of professional billing letter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Account Letter


Follow-up Letter


Campaign Letter

columns.name: VISIT_NUM
columns.description: Professional billing visit number attached to this note.

columns.name: CRT_INST_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: This is a virtual item that gets the create instant (I HNO 17105), in local time format.

columns.name: NOTE_PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is a virtual item that displays the note purpose. It was previously stored in Note - Purpose (INP-5045).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


NORMAL


COSIGN


ADDENDUM


Non Authorized Transcription


Resident Authorized Transcription


Authorized Transcription


Transcriptions with No recepient id

columns.name: PRIORITY_YN
columns.description:
The priority of the note (Yes = High, No = Routine).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ACTIVE_FROM_DT
columns.description: The date on which the note becomes active.

columns.name: ACTIVE_TO_DT
columns.description: The date after which the note becomes inactive.

columns.name: TREAT_SUM_RLS_TO_MYC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a Treatment Summary is released to MyChart.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: UNSIGNED_YN

columns.name: TREAT_SUM_RLS_TO_MYC_CSN
columns.description: Stores the CSN of the Treatment Summary (HNO) that is released to MyChart. If you use IntraConnect, this column stores the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: COMMENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the last user to edit the internal comment in either the Continued Care and Services Coordination or Payer Communication workflows.

columns.name: COMMENT_EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the comment was last edited in either the Continued Care and Services Coordination or Payer Communication workflows. In UTC.

columns.name: CONVERSATION_MSG_ID
columns.description: The record for the message that was also filed as a note. The text filed in the message and the quicknote will be the same and displaying one of these to the end user should be sufficient.
